project.name: C-C415A-PSQL-02-ST01-DT06-DF01-CF22-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to the function definition. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C415A-PSQL-02-ST01-DT06-DF01-CF22-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: initalize a database Malloc a pointer, and free it. If input begins with ascii character 'a' or higher, free it a second time. Causes seg fault.

scoring_formula.formula: (UTF8 OR ASCII) AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C415A-PSQL-02-ST01-DT06-DF01-CF22-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: perform a select Malloc a pointer, and free it. If input begins with ascii character 'a' or higher, free it a second time. Causes seg fault.

process.script: sleep 22 && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/psql -h ss-localhost -d booktown -p 8432 -c "SELECT * FROM books WHERE title = 'Dune'"
if [[ -s "$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/postgres.pid" ]]; then kill $(cat "$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/postgres.pid"); else echo "Skipping postgres kill, no PID file."; fi;

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-02 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
